overview: Go back to the place where it all began, in the midst of a dreary night -- the kind the ghosts of our past (that come back to haunt us) find irresistible. Relive this poetic, frightening, and sad tale of love and soul forever lost in a charming, new light.
tagline: Whether you are a fan of Poe, or just an unsuspecting viewer/listener, this awe-inspiring rendition of The Raven is bound to leave an impression on your mortal soul.
title: The Raven (by Edgar Allan Poe)
